name: Fairytale I - Growing Pains
description: Recently, farmers around RuneScape have been noticing some trouble with their farming patches. They just don't seem to have the same yields as before. What could be the source of this malady?

quests: Jungle Potion (For ironmen asked to obtain Proboscis)
misc: The ability to defeat a level 111 Tanglefoot with limited weaponry
Ironmen who do not have the necessary Herblore level to clean possible herbs required to bless the secateurs will need to visit the Zahur|herblore shop in Nardah to clean the grimy herbs.
